ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen shelled edamame (green soybeans)

cookingTips: Pat edamame completely dry before roasting to achieve crispiness
Toss with oil and seasonings in a bowl before spreading on baking sheet
Roast at 400°F for 12-15 minutes, shaking pan halfway through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the importance of removing moisture from frozen edamame for proper crisping, and how high heat develops flavor.
